#define BAUD   9600
#define BUFF_LEN   700
#define BAUD_PRESCALE   (((F_CPU / (BAUD * 16UL))) - 1)

Functions

void uart_start (void)
 Sets up the registers and starts the UART for a baud of 9600.
void uart_sendint (uint8_t data)
 Send an 8bit long piece of data.
void uart_sendint16 (uint16_t data)
 Send a 16bit long piece of data.
void uart_sendchar (char *data)
 Sends either a single piece of data stored as a char, or sends a string. (If sending a string, avr-gcc will yell a warning at you, you can ignore it).
uint8_t uart_get (void)
 Returns the data which was stored in the recieve register and retreived by the interrupt.
